metadata.title: CVE-2020-14340 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was discovered in XNIO where file descriptor leak caused bygrowing amounts of NIO Selector file handles between garbage collectioncycles. It may allow the attacker to cause a denial of service. It affectsXNIO versions 3.6.0.Beta1 through 3.8.1.Final.

criterions.comment: jboss-xnio package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
